lead_paragraph: This week: Katie Roiphe on sex and the American male novelist; Lorraine Adams on post-colonial African fiction; Motoko Rich with notes from the field; and Jennifer Schuessler with best-seller news. Sam Tanenhaus is the host.
snippet: This week: Katie Roiphe on sex and the American male novelist; Lorraine Adams on post-colonial African fiction; Motoko Rich with notes from the field; and Jennifer Schuessler with best-seller news. Sam Tanenhaus is the host.

headline.main: Book Review Podcast: Sex and the Male Novelist

abstract: This week: Katie Roiphe on sex and the American male novelist; Lorraine Adams on post-colonial African fiction; Motoko Rich with notes from the field; and Jennifer Schuessler with best-seller news. Sam Tanenhaus is the host.
